articles.author: Nick Robertson
articles.title: Sicknick family concerned over Supreme Court's immunity decision - The Hill
articles.description: The family of a police officer who died after responding to the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riots warned that the Supreme Court’s presidential immunity decision this week should “frighten” Americans. The Supreme Court issued a landmark decision Monday that granted …
